name: To The Top (itch) (MrJooj)
description:
My submition to the Weekly Game Jam 263 =D
Skyscraper's rooms are looking cheap?  You only have 60 seconds to buy all rooms on the floor before someone else buys it all. Put a capitalist slave there and earn money through their hard work. How high can you afford to go? 

Use 1, 2, 3 on the keyboard or click on the screen to select the type of work.

Work demand is shown on the left, keep the resources balanced as the demand changes.  If the resources are reaching 0, and a red !!! is showing up, you need more rooms with that kind of worker.  

Spent around 25 hours developing and testing, and 5 on the amazing art. Have you seen that pixel art phone? Isn't it just perfect? 

Spaghetti Source Code: https://github.com/MrJooj/GameJam-Skyscraper
